name: CBS International (Netherlands) BV
goal: CBS is a mass media business that creates and distributes industry-leading content across a variety of platforms to audiences around the world. CBS has businesses with origins that date back to the dawn of the broadcasting age as well as new ventures that operate on the leading edge of media. CBS owns one of the world’s largest libraries of entertainment content, making its brand — “the Eye” — one of the most recognized in business. CBS's operations span virtually every field of media and entertainment, including cable, publishing, radio, local TV, film, and interactive and socially responsible media.
interests: Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Digital Single Market, Copyright, Competition Policy,
Audiovisual Media Services, Satellite and Cable Directive
